summary: Test module that validates the ECIES (Elliptic Curve Integrated Encryption Scheme) implementation against the specifications defined in BIP‑SNICKER, using sample data and cryptographic utilities to ensure correct encryption, decryption, and encoding handling.
business_intent: Guarantee that the ECIES functionality in the Bitcoin library operates reliably and securely, providing confidence for developers and users that encrypted communications conform to the BIP‑SNICKER standard.
